caption: MITRE ATT&CK® Technique
description: The MITRE ATT&CK® Technique object describes the technique ID and/or name associated to an attack, as defined by ATT&CK® Matrix.
name: technique

name.description: The name of the attack technique, as defined by ATT&CK® Matrix. For example: Active Scanning.

src_url.description: The versioned permalink of the attack technique, as defined by ATT&CK® Matrix. For example: https://attack.mitre.org/versions/v14/techniques/T1595/.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the attack technique, as defined by ATT&CK® Matrix. For example: T1595.
